description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Blast your way through the alien creatures in this 2D Platform adventure.  Collect Crystals and DNA packs along the way from hidden locations. Weapon upgrades and giant bosses are all included in this 2D Platform Blaster.
description.short: Blast your way through the alien creatures in this 2D Platform adventure.  Collect Crystals and DNA packs along the way from hidden locations. Weapon upgrades and giant bosses are all included in this 2D Platform Blaster.
